column3: Latest;P------reah Sihanouk province –------ An elderly foreign man was found dead in a on the morning of January 11
column5: in a bungalow on Koh Rong.------ The man was name as KENNETH G MCKINNON
column6: a 77 year old Canadian national who had come to Cambodia as a tourist. The body was kept at the same place pending an examination by technical and scientific officials and doctors. ------KBN
